Posts.Content: thank you for your reply, i dont really have much info from my surgeon all i know is that i had a small tumor in my left breast and in 1 lympth node and had my breast and all nodes removed then course of chemos and radiation. she said my treatment has been a success thus far and when i asked about risk to other side she said i was at double the risk than someone who has never had breast cancer.
Posts.Title: need help with decision

Posts.Content: very confused as to whether to have surgery to my other breast after having breast cancer 2 years ago. can anyone help with info about my risks of getting cancer in my remaining breast
Posts.Title: need help with decision
